one.par: Cooked, photographed and written in Vienna by Ed Tötzl and the elite troop from Naschmarkt

two.header: THE VIENNA KITCHEN IS THE ONLY KITCHEN IN THE WORLD THAT'S NAMED AFTER ITS CITY!
two.par: In the multi-ethnic state of the monarchy, people came for centuries from all over the world to Vienna and have brought their greatest treasure with them: YOUR RECIPES!

three.par_1: And we have prepared these recipes for you in such a way that EVERYONE can cook them! But just turn the pages yourself and let yourself be convinced.
three.par_2: We have prepared these recipes for you in such a way that EVERYONE can cook them! But just leaf through it yourself and let yourself be convinced

five.par_1: As you can see when leafing through, every single step in our recipes is explained in detail in pictures and text and supplemented with practical tips!
five.par_2: And the photos show you exactly what then in your kitchen in the pot or on the plate!

order_sum.shipping_disclaimer: Shipping costs will be added later during checkout

imprint.part_1: IMRESSUM: Ed Tötzl & Michael Patocka, 1010 Vienna, Börsegasse 9,
